title: Is the Google Pixel 5 worth it in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes, you can but Google Pixel 5 comes with excellent features that will give you nice gaming experience with good camera quality and nice battery backup. Google Pixel 5 specifications 6 inches AMOLED Display8GB RAM128GB StorageQualcomm Snapdragon 765G Processor4080mAh battery with an 18-watt fast chargerThe rear camera is 12 MP + 16 MP and the front is 8MPthese features are excellent in this price range you can buy it.
